title: I Will Politely Decline The Male Lead - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Eidetic Memory   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Love Triangles   Nobles   Quiet Characters   Reincarnated in Another World   Revenge   Reverse Harem   Second Chance   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Yehwon   예훤
description:
She had possessed the villainess in a novel who was destined for a miserably death. In her first life, she followed the original story and died, only to wake up in the body of the villainess once again. 

On her next attempt, she tried everything to avoid the death flags, but in the end, she only death awaited her once again. Now on her third attempt, she has made up her mind.

Let’s just live!

“I’ll die if I live like this, and I’ll be killed if I live like that!”

But was it because it because the story had changed too much compared to the original? The main characters’ interest in the original Female Lead seems to now be directed at her somehow…?>
